segments.text: John , my father isn't there at all . Are you kidding ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Poor fellow ! What's the date today , buddy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's ... OH , it's the first of April , April Fools ' Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You forgot all about it , didn't you ?
segments.speaker: S2
